text: Invaders from Mars is a 1953 American science fiction horror movie. It was directed by William Cameron Menzies. Actors include Jimmy Hunt, Helena Carter, Arthur Franz, Morris Ankrum, Leif Erickson, Max Wagner, Walter Sande, and Hillary Brooke. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. There was a remake in 1986. ==Other websites== * * Category:1953 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:Movies set on Mars Category:Movies about extraterrestrial life Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Invaders from Mars (1953 movie)
